1. 

A) C1,6(1001(2))    =  001001(2)

B) C1,8(1101(2))    =  00001101(2)     -> 11110010(2)

C) C2,6(101011(2))  =  010100(2) + 1   -> 010101(2)

D) C2,7(101101(2))  =  1010010(2) + 1  -> 1010011(2)

E) C2,8(110010(2))  =  11001101(2) + 1 -> 11001110(2)


2.

A) C1,6(231(4))     =  101101(2)        -> 010010(2)

B) C1,8(E7(16))     =  11100111(2)      -> 00011000(2)

C) C2,6(132(4))     =  011110(2)        -> 100001 + 1     -> 100010(2)

D) C2,10(173(4))    =  (0)001111011(2)  -> 1110000100 + 1 -> 1110000101(2)

E) C2,8(9F(16))     =  10111001(2)      -> 01000110 + 1   -> 01000111(2)


3.

A) 10011(2)   = 10011   - 1  -> 10010  -> 01101(2) -> 13(10)

B) 110111(2)  = 110111  - 1 -> 110110  -> 001001   -> 9(10)

C) 100101(2)  = 100101  - 1 -> 100100  -> 011011(2)

D) 1010011(2) = 1010011 - 1 -> 1010010 -> 0101101(2)

E) 1111011(2) = 1111011 - 1 -> 1111010 -> 0000010 = 01(16)
